title: Nicolás Leiva
text: Nicolás Leiva is an <a href="Argentine">Argentine</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who plays for the <a href="Jaguares%20%28Super%20Rugby%29">Jaguares</a>. On 2 January 2018, Leiva was named in the Jaguares squad for the <a href="2018%20Super%20Rugby%20season">2018 Super Rugby season</a>.
